notaryProviderContract.condition: Any assets issued by Cointrader Exchange Inc are backed by 100 percent reserves. The backing details for each asset can be viewed in their individual asset contracts.
Cointrader Exchange Inc operates open source Open-Transactions software; code audits are randomly performed by CodeNotary.com.
Issuance and redemption fees for Cointrader Exchange Inc assets will be specified in their individual asset contracts.
Cointrader Exchange Inc is in no way liable for the digital assets that it mints and issues, nor is liable for the transactions that it processes.

The total quantity of any digital asset minted by Cointrader Exchange Inc will be backed by 100 percent provable reserves of said asset — e.g., gold, silver, bitcoin etc — held in a highly secure and auditable location. Audit location and details will be specified in each individual asset contract. All Cointrader Exchange Inc digital asset contracts are cryptographic digital-analogues to their respective natural identities; for example: gold, silver, bitcoin. They cannot be forged by anyone, including the server operator.
The purchase and trading of digital assets on Cointrader Exchange Inc servers is always conducted on the basis of strong privacy.
